channel.title: Practices on Getting Started Guides

item.title: Technical Interview Prep
item.description: General Advice when solving problems # Understand the problem being asked Don’t forget to handle edge cases Expressing your answer is just as important as understanding the problem, and solving it! Problems with Stacks # Checking parenthesis # Examples: Input: () Output: true Input: ()[]{} Output: true Input: ([)] Output: false Input: {[]} Output: true Input : {[]{()}} Output : true Input : [{}{}(] Output :false The logic here is to push a new item on to a stack when we notice an input with an opener, and pop when there is a closer.
